Package com.rssoap.view.mailBoxView.util

Class Summary
ArticleViewerSorter This class implements the sorting for the article table in the mail view
ColumnConstants some useful constants for organizing tables.
MailBoxTableContentProvider Content provider for the table in the mailbox com.rssoap.view.
MailBoxTableLabelProvider Label provider for the table in the mailbox com.rssoap.view.
MailBoxTreeContentProvider MailBoxTreeContentProvider is a class to provide the content to the tree in a MailBoxView
MailBoxTreeLabelProvider Label provider for the tree in the mailbox com.rssoap.view.
